description: Supporting Gender Equality and Women's Rights in Timor-Leste through Conditional Cash Transfer

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Through the provision of technical support to the Ministry of Social Solidarity, UNDP is facilitating the improved design, implementation and delivery of the Ministry's Bolsa da Mae social protection scheme.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
